label: AB_oP4_51_e_f-001
title: $\beta$'-AuCd ($B19$) Structure
comments:
When $a=b=c$, $z_{1}=1/4$, and $z_{2}=3/4$ the atoms are on the sites of a \href{current_web_home_dir/A_cF4_225_a-001}{face-centered cubic lattice}. 
 When $a=c$, $z_{1}=1/4$, and $z_{2}=3/4$ the system reduces to the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_tP2_123_a_d-001}{$L1_{0}$ (AuCu) structure}. 
 When $a/b=(8/3)^{2/3}$, $c/b=3^{1/2}$, $z_{1}=1/3$, and $z_{2}=5/6$, the atoms are on the sites of the \href{current_web_home_dir/A_hP2_194_c-001}{hcp structure}. 
 Finally, when $z_{2}=1/2+z_{1}$ the atoms are at the positions of the \href{current_web_home_dir/A_oC4_63_c-001}{$\alpha$-U ($A20$) structure}.
